org.la4j.linear

Interface LinearSystemSolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GaussianSolver, JacobiSolver, SeidelSolver, SquareRootSolver, SweepSolver

    public interface LinearSystemSolver
extends Serializable
    Linear System Solver interface; This class implements Strategy design pattern;
